column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Chicago would not be Chicago without the 8th Wonder of the World: the Art Institute! We took our own odyssey into the vastness of artistic sensibilities on display
column2: as we wandered about and marveled at the works of many of the finest artists in human history
column3: Truly awe-inspiring! The Greek and Japanese artifacts held me so spellbound
column4: that my time allocation for touring the magnificent museum was constantly undergoing revisions - happily so. Good food on site and strolling art gardens augment the totality of the art for arts' sake excursion. Must do. Must see. My date and I capped off a perfect weekender by lazily enjoying ourselves - hand in hand
